title: Formative Assessment and Editing Integration Course for Interactive Videodisc Development

context.prior_knowledge: Ability to use basic digital content creation tools and understanding of fundamental language teaching principles
context.additional_context: Customized educational course for in-service secondary language education practitioners. Provision of online collaborative learning environments using personal devices.

learning_goals: Formative assessment tools can be designed and applied at each stage of interactive video disc development.
Video content editing strategies can be established in alignment with language education objectives.
A content improvement process incorporating feedback can be applied to real-world projects.
Integrated editing-assessment approaches can be implemented in small team-based project development.

resources: Interactive Video Authoring Tools (e.g., Adobe Captivate, H5P)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
